resources.string: Camera permission is required to capture frames along your route.
Location permission is required to attach GPS coordinates to frames.
Camera and location permissions are required for secure capture.
No network connection. Please connect to the internet to start secure capture.
PHOTON captures frames locally, signs metadata, and uploads over mutual TLS with certificate pinning. No UI elements or personal content outside of navigation are persisted on disk.

PHOTON securely captures directions imagery along your route.

• Frames are kept in memory and wiped after upload
• Metadata is signed with Ed25519
• Uploads go through mutual TLS with certificate pinning

You stay in control with a kill-switch, Wi‑Fi-only mode and detailed settings.
